title: Uma Thurman exhibits her long legs during Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week
title_page: Uma Thurman exhibits her long legs during Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's famed for her ability to dominate the screen.
But Uma Thurman also commanded the front row when she showcased her style credentials at the Guo Pei Spring Summer 2016 as part of Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week on Wednesday.
The 45-year-old actress was bound to turn heads as she sat among the fashion elite to gaze at the works of the Chinese fashion designer, who was behind Rihanna's, now iconic, yellow gown at the 2015 Met Ball.

Here she is! Uma Thurman commanded the front row when she showcased her style credentials at the Guo Pei Spring Summer 2016 as part of Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week on Wednesday
The Kill Bill star demonstrated her love for the fashion designer by slipping her statuesque frame into one of her typically intricate garments.
Sitting just above the knee, Uma layered a simple black mini dress beneath a jacket that was emblazoned with an ornate floral pattern.
Ensuring the ensemble wasn't too feminine, it boasted a sizeable collar and slightly billowing mid-length sleeves.

Uma injected a touch of opulence into the style by pairing it with a silver cuff bracelet and matching drop earrings.
She elongated her already lithe legs by slipping her perfectly pedicured feet into barely-there black stilettos as she glided into the show.
Her blonde locks were worn heavily side-parted and tied into a low ponytail, which looked to have been purposefully finished in a slightly undone style.

The Pulp Fiction actress showcased her natural beauty by opting for only a neutral make-up palette, though Uma emphasised her blue eyes with a thick swoosh of black eyeliner.
The Hollywood actress looked to be having the time of her life as she mingled with the likes of Caroline Scheufele, the Artistic Director and Co-President of Swiss-based luxury watches and jewellery manufacturer, Chopard.
The two looked as though they had been missing one another as Uma took her by the hand and greeted with a warm hug before they chatted up a storm ahead of showtime.
